sentence.Network_en: His proficiency as a surgeon is well known.
sentence.Network_cn: 他作为一名外科医生的水平是有名的.

sentence.Network_en: He made little proficiency in literary accomplishments.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在文学方面成就不多.

sentence.Network_en: Evidence of basic proficiency in English is part of the admission requirement.
sentence.Network_cn: 英语基本熟练是入学条件之一。

首先，语言水平测试 (proficiency test)就建立在语言研究和测试理论的基础上，词汇、语法、语义、语用等方面的研究已经为构建测试 …

3.1.6 英语能力证明(English proficiency)　　该项包括该所学校是否需要学生提交必要的语言证明以及该生是否符合该校要求具备的语言.

entry.def: If you show proficiency in something, you show ability or skill at it.

example.ex: Evidence of basic proficiency in English is part of the admission requirement.
example.tran: 英语基本熟练是入学条件之一。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of having great facility and competence
2. skillfulness in the command of fundamentals deriving from practice and familiarity;

auth_sentence.content: Proficiency in molecular biology and virology techniques is essential.
auth_sentence.res_content: Proficiency in molecular biology and virology techniques is essential.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Proficiency in molecular biology and virology techniques is essential.

auth_sentence.content: Proficiency in the German language would be of advantage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Proficiency in the German language would be of advantage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Proficiency in the German language would be of advantage.

auth_sentence.content: Proficiency in both Russian and Polish languages is required.
auth_sentence.res_content: Proficiency in both Russian and Polish languages is required.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Proficiency in both Russian and Polish languages is required.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 缺乏的, 不足的, 不完善的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+fici做,制作+ent……的→做得不够的→不足的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,效率高的;有能力的,能胜任的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ef出+fici做,制作+ent……的→能做出事来→有效的
pro前面+fici做+ent……的→做在[别人] 前面→精通
proficient[[adj.精通的;熟练的]]→n.[in]熟练,精通

sentences.en: His proficiency as a surgeon is well known.
sentences.cn: 他作为一名外科医生的水平是有名的。

jushi.english: Her proficiency in English literature is appreciated by her tutor.
jushi.chinese: 她对英国文学的精通深得导师的赏识。
